title: A good, lightweight to do list.
comment: This is a simple widget, and that's exactly what I was looking for. If you, like me, don't want much more than a little place to jot down your tasks for the day, you should definitely give this a shot. The only "complaint" I have is that there aren't any options to change the widget's appearance, but even then, it's not like I really care much. It might bother someone that's more fussed about things matching.
The dev has said more colours are coming but..

title: Love the lack of permissions and simplicity.
comment: Fulfills a need for a lean offline list in a widget form with no need for any backups or cloud storage... Just what I was looking for. It could use some work on the input by allowing SAVE to perform an implicit ADD, and management of editing items by allowing one to mark COMPLETE (with a swipe?) that could grey/strike-through; so you could reference it for a time until you really delete it. Just some thoughts, nice clean app though Ted, thanks.

title: Too buggy
comment: Screen space used ineffectively. The title is pointless. No way to edit tasks. Too easy to delete a task - short tap means delete, and it's a widget that's always on the screen! Scroll bar not shown unless scrolling, hiding that there are more tasks. Tap plus, enter "foo", tap "Save" - "foo" is not saved!

title: Beautiful
comment: Yet, taking so much space on the screen...  My ideal widget would be: 1. Fully transparent when no tasks 2. Have a shortcut for launcher to add task (so, no buttons to add task on widget is needed) 3. Only show background for list of tasks

title: love this
comment: this is exactly what I was looking for, like others have already stated the only other things id ask for is color options and some kind of sync/backup with google or another service of some sort where I can also edit the list online or through other devices. a dark theme would be nice too.

title: Nice app
comment: Of wishes: may want to remove the inscription "crachr", to add support for color selection. I guess as long as all of the comments.
Color selection will be a feature soon.

title: Perfect
comment: This is all I every wanted from a tasks app; a widget that doesn't open the whole app.  I hope some theme customization is in the works

title: Love the simplicity, needs customizable colors
comment: It's not really true material design but I like where this is going. I'll rate 5 stars when color customization is brought in.
Will do, just give me about a week.
